Description:
Installation and Repair:Install, repair, and maintain plumbing systems, fixtures, and pipes according to established standards and regulations.
Inspect plumbing systems and identify issues such as leaks, blockages, or corrosion.
Collaborate with other team members to coordinate plumbing projects and ensure timely completion.Maintenance:Perform routine maintenance tasks on plumbing systems to prevent issues and prolong their lifespan.
Clear blockages and repair or replace damaged components such as pipes, faucets, toilets, and water heaters.Troubleshooting:Diagnose plumbing problems and provide effective solutions to restore proper functionality.
Identify and address the root causes of plumbing issues to prevent future occurrences.Skills
Skills:
Solid knowledge of plumbing systems, components, and fixtures.
Ability to read and interpret blueprints and technical drawings.
Strong problem-solving skills to diagnose and troubleshoot plumbing issues.
Experience in pipefitting, soldering, welding, and other plumbing techniques.
Excellent manual dexterity and physical stamina to perform various plumbing tasks.
Knowledge of local plumbing codes and regulations.
Strong communication skills to interact with clients and team members.
Attention to detail and a commitment to producing high-quality work.
Time management skills to handle multiple tasks and meet deadlines.
